select game_seq.nextval from dual
insert into game( game_no, game_title, game_price, game_developer, game_publication_date, game_discount, game_category, game_grade, game_theme, game_description, game_short_description, game_user_score, game_review_count, game_platforms, game_system_requirement ) values( #{gameNo}, #{gameTitle}, #{gamePrice}, #{gameDeveloper}, #{gamePublicationDate}, #{gameDiscount}, #{gameCategory}, #{gameGrade}, #{gameTheme}, #{gameDescription}, #{gameShortDescription}, #{gameUserScore}, #{gameReviewCount}, #{gamePlatforms, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gameSystemRequirement} )
mapper.select: select * from game order by game_no asc
select * from game where instr(${column}, #{keyword}) > 0 order by game_no asc
mapper.update: update game set game_title = #{gameTitle}, game_price = #{gamePrice}, game_developer = #{gameDeveloper}, game_publication_date = #{gamePublicationDate}, game_discount = #{gameDiscount}, game_category = #{gameCategory}, game_grade = #{gameGrade}, game_theme = #{gameTheme}, game_description = #{gameDescription}, game_short_description = #{gameShortDescription}, game_user_score = #{gameUserScore}, game_review_count = #{gameReviewCount}, game_platforms = #{gamePlatforms}, game_system_requirement = #{gameSystemRequirement} where game_no = #{gameNo}
